com.qmetry.qaf.automation.testng.dataprovider

Annotation Type QAFDataProvider


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
public @interface QAFDataProvider
    Values of this annotation parameters can be overridden by providing property <tc_name>.testdata=<value>

    The value contains comma separated parameter and value combination: <tc_name>.testdata=<param>=value,<param>=value Supported parameters are

    • datafile : data file url, csv or excel file url
    • sheetname: sheet name for excel data file, default is the first sheet
    • labelname: name of label, if data start and end cell marked with label in excel sheet
    • hasheaderrow: true/false, indicates excel sheet has header row
    • sqlquery: database query, will not be used if data file provided. Must required other db properties
    com.qmetry.qaf.automation.testng.dataprovider.QAFDataProvider.java
    Author:
    chirag

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String dataFile
      Used to provide csv or excel file.
      boolean hasHeaderRow
      Optional flag to indicate excel data contains header row that need to be skipped.
      java.lang.String key
      Optional data label name in excel sheet.
      java.lang.String sheetName
      Optional sheet name (value or property) for excel file.
      java.lang.String sqlQuery
      Used to provide database query.

    • Element Detail

      • dataFile

        public abstract java.lang.String dataFile
        Used to provide csv or excel file. Can be overridden by property <tc_name>.testdata
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • sheetName

        public abstract java.lang.String sheetName
        Optional sheet name (value or property) for excel file. If not provided first sheet will be considered. Can be overridden by property <tc_name>.testdata
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • hasHeaderRow

        public abstract boolean hasHeaderRow
        Optional flag to indicate excel data contains header row that need to be skipped. Default value is false. Can be overridden by property <tc_name>.testdata
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • key

        public abstract java.lang.String key
        Optional data label name in excel sheet. Required if want to provide data start/end cell marked with label. Can be overridden by property <tc_name>.testdata
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • sqlQuery

        public abstract java.lang.String sqlQuery
        Used to provide database query. Will not be considered if data file is provided.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
